name: Tommy's Tragedy
description:
There was a tragedy with Tommy. By the will of fate, Tommy finds an erotic magazine, but the owner of shameful images immediately finds out about it. Such a lot of trouble for such a little boy...

How will this difficult situation be resolved and how will a skill to play 12-puzzle help?

Features:
  • Amazing drawing
  • Real 12-puzzle gameplay, real hardcore
  • Satire on top Steam sales chart
  • Music by Grizzly Knows No Remorse
